welcome_message_body: Welcome to Arusha, the vibrant gateway to Tanzania's stunning national parks and the majestic Mount Kilimanjaro. We hope you enjoy exploring our city's unique blend of urban charm and natural beauty.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
